original_title: Sri Lanka’s shares edge down in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT –Sri Lanka‘s shares edged up in mid day trade on Wednesday, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The main All Share Price Index was up 0.85 percent or 100.17 points to 11,624.05, the most liquid index was S&P SL20 was down 0.87 percent or 30.05 points to 3,440.08
Losers during mid day trade were Ceylinco Insurance, John Keells Holdings and Commercial Bank. (Colombo/Aug09/2023)
